content: easy peasy beanie items needed  swish worsted or similar weight wool approx 100-110 yards  h 5 0mm hook  yarn needle gauge diameter of first 2 rounds = 2 5 diameter of first 6 rounds = 7 note all double_crochet rounds begin with ch2 which counts as first double_crochet throughout the pattern for the purposes of this pattern however i do suggest that you go to youtube and search for no turning chain double_crochet this is the technique that i use and i find it to be much more attractive than a chain 2 or chain 3 begin with magic loop round 1 chain 2 11 double_crochet join 12 double_crochet round 2 chain 2 double_crochet in same st as joining 2 double_crochet in every double_crochet around join 24 double_crochet round 3 chain 2 * 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * to end ending with 2 double_crochet in same st join 36 double_crochet round 4 chain 2 double_crochet in next st * 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 2 sts * repeat from * to * ending with 2 double_crochet in same st join 48 double_crochet round 5 chain 2 double_crochet in next 2 sts * 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 3 sts * repeat from * to * ending with 2 double_crochet in same st join 60 double_crochet round 6 chain 2 double_crochet in next 3 sts * 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 4 sts * repeat from * to * ending with 2 double_crochet in same st join 72 double_crochet rnds 7-11 chain 2 double_crochet in each st around join 72 double_crochet rnds 11- chain 1 single_crochet in same st and in ea st around do not join continue in the spiral until hat brim is to desired length slip_stitch in next 2 sts weave in ends
